/api/command.name: Execute Command
/api/command.description: Execute command line commands on the server system.

/api/create_folder.name: Create Folder
/api/create_folder.description: Create a new folder/directory in the file system.

/api/delete_file.name: Delete File
/api/delete_file.description: Delete a file from the file system.

/api/delete_folder.name: Delete Folder
/api/delete_folder.description: Delete a folder/directory from the file system.

/api/download.name: Download Files
/api/download.description: Download files from the server to the client.

/api/finder.name: File Explorer
/api/finder.description: List files and directories at a given path.

/api/ftp/create_user.name: Create FTP User
/api/ftp/create_user.description: Create a new FTP user with specified permissions.

/api/ftp/delete_user.name: Delete FTP User
/api/ftp/delete_user.description: Delete an existing FTP user from the system.

/api/ftp/edit_user.name: Edit FTP User
/api/ftp/edit_user.description: Edit an existing FTP user's details and permissions.

/api/ftp/get_users.name: Get FTP Users
/api/ftp/get_users.description: Retrieve all FTP users and their details.

/api/get_file.name: Get File Content
/api/get_file.description: Retrieve the content of a specific file.

/api/get_logs.name: Get System Logs
/api/get_logs.description: Retrieve system logs and activity records.

/api/get_version.name: Get Version
/api/get_version.description: Get the current version of the server software.

/api/new_file.name: Create New File
/api/new_file.description: Create a new file with specified content.

/api/rename_file.name: Rename File
/api/rename_file.description: Rename an existing file in the file system.

/api/rename_folder.name: Rename Folder
/api/rename_folder.description: Rename an existing folder/directory in the file system.

/api/resources.name: System Resources
/api/resources.description: Get system resource usage (CPU, memory, disk).

/api/role/edit.name: Edit Roles
/api/role/edit.description: Edit role permissions and endpoint access.

/api/role/get.name: Get Roles
/api/role/get.description: Get all roles and their endpoint permissions.

/api/update.name: Update Server
/api/update.description: Update the server software to the latest version.

/api/upload.name: Upload Files
/api/upload.description: Upload files from client to the server.

/api/user/create.name: Create User
/api/user/create.description: Create a new user account with specified permissions.

/api/user/delete.name: Delete User
/api/user/delete.description: Delete an existing user account from the system.

/api/user/edit.name: Edit User
/api/user/edit.description: Edit an existing user's account details and permissions.

/api/user/get_all.name: Get All Users
/api/user/get_all.description: Retrieve all user accounts and their details.

/api/cloud/manage.name: Manage Cloud Settings
/api/cloud/manage.description: Manage cloud configuration including enable/disable, authentication data deletion, and signup functionality.
